alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 17 at 11:15AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall will be possible. * WHERE...Portions of north central and west central Arizona, including the following locations, Page, Grand Canyon, Vermilion Cliffs, Supai, Flagstaff, Williams, Ash Fork, Seligman, Chino Valley, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Camp Verde, and Black Canyon City. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Flooding will be possible in creeks, normally dry washes, slot canyons, and swimming holes. Low-water crossings could also become flooded, which would create deadly travel conditions. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
